mapper.select: select tp.post_number, count(distinct tpl.user_number) , tp.user_number , tpf.post_file_index from tbl_post tp left join tbl_post_like tpl on tpl.post_number = tp.post_number left join tbl_post_file tpf on tpf.post_number = tp.post_number where tpf.post_file_index = '1' group by tp.post_number, tpf.post_file_index order by count(distinct tpl.user_number) desc limit 8
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_post_like where post_number = #{postNumber} and user_number= #{userNumber}
